Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: isInsideCoroutine
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns true if this property is called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: delay(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine for a certain time. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html.name: Coroutine
Structs/Coroutine.html.abstract: Additional struct with utility methods to work with coroutines.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: scheduleTask(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Performs the task at the next possible opportunity.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: startCoroutine(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Start a new coroutine on the current scheduler.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: await(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Start a coroutine and await its result. Must be called inside other coroutine.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: coroutineFuture(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Starts a new coroutine and returns its future result.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: actor(of:maxBufferSize:body:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Starts new coroutine that is receiving messages from its mailbox channel and returns its mailbox channel as a Sender.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html.name: CoroutineScheduler
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html.abstract: A protocol that defines how to execute a task.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: subscribeCoFuture()
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Attaches CoFuture as a subscriber and returns it. CoFuture will receive result only once.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: init(task:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Starts a new coroutine and initializes future with its result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: result
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns completed result or nil if this future has not been completed yet.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: isCanceled
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns true when the current future is canceled.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: await()
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Await for the result of this CoFuture without blocking the current thread. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: await(timeout:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Await for the result of this CoFuture without blocking the current thread. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: map(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which performs a synchronous computation and return transformed value.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: recover(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is in an error state, run the provided callback, which can recover from the error and return a new value.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: mapResult(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which performs a synchronous computation and return transformed result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: flatMap(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When the current CoFuture is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which will provide a new CoFuture.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: flatMapError(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When the current CoFuture is in an error state, run the provided callback, which

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: flatMapResult(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When the current CoFuture is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which will provide a new CoFuture.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenComplete(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has any result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenSuccess(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has a success result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenFailure(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has a failure result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenCanceled(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture is canceled.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: publisher()
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns a publisher that emits result of this CoFuture.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: maxBufferSize
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: The maximum number of elements that can be stored in a channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: count
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Returns a number of elements in this channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: isEmpty
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Returns true if the channel is empty (contains no elements), which means no elements to receive.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: awaitSend(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Sends the element to this channel, suspending the coroutine while the buffer of this channel is full. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: sendFuture(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Adds the future’s value to this channel when it will be available.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: offer(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Immediately adds the value to this channel, if this doesn’t violate its capacity restrictions, and returns true.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: close()
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Closes this channel. No more send should be performed on the channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: cancel()
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Closes the channel and removes all buffered sent elements from it.

Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.name: whenCanceled(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Sender.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoChannel is canceled.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: maxBufferSize
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: The maximum number of elements that can be stored in a channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: count
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Returns a number of elements in this channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: isEmpty
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Returns true if the channel is empty (contains no elements), which means no elements to receive.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: awaitReceive()
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Retrieves and removes an element from this channel if it’s not empty, or suspends a coroutine while the channel is empty.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: receiveFuture()
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Creates CoFuture with retrieved value from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: poll()
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Retrieves and removes an element from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: whenReceive(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Adds an observer callback to receive an element from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: map(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Returns new Receiver that provides transformed values from this Receiver.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: cancel()
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Closes the channel and removes all buffered sent elements from it.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: whenCanceled(_:)
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoChannel is canceled.

Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.name: makeIterator()
Classes/CoChannel/Receiver.html#/s:14Swi.abstract: Make an iterator which successively retrieves and removes values from the channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: maxBufferSize
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: The maximum number of elements that can be stored in a channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: init(maxBufferSize:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Initializes a channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: pair
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns tuple of Receiver and Sender.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: sender
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: A CoChannel wrapper that provides send-only functionality.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: awaitSend(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Sends the element to this channel, suspending the coroutine while the buffer of this channel is full. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: sendFuture(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Adds the future’s value to this channel when it will be available.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: offer(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Immediately adds the value to this channel, if this doesn’t violate its capacity restrictions, and returns true. Otherwise, just returns false.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: receiver
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: A CoChannel wrapper that provides receive-only functionality.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: awaitReceive()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Retrieves and removes an element from this channel if it’s not empty, or suspends a coroutine while the channel is empty.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: receiveFuture()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Creates CoFuture with retrieved value from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: poll()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Retrieves and removes an element from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: whenReceive(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Adds an observer callback to receive an element from this channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: count
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns a number of elements in this channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: isEmpty
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns true if the channel is empty (contains no elements), which means no elements to receive.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: map(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns new Receiver that provides transformed values from this CoChannel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: close()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Closes this channel. No more send should be performed on the channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: isClosed
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns true if the channel is closed.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: cancel()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Closes the channel and removes all buffered sent elements from it.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: isCanceled
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns true if the channel is canceled.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: whenCanceled(_:)
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoChannel is canceled.

Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: makeIterator()
Classes/CoChannel.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Make an iterator which successively retrieves and removes values from the channel.

Classes/CoChannel.html.name: CoChannel
Classes/CoChannel.html.abstract: Channel is a non-blocking primitive for communication between a sender and a receiver.

Classes/CoFuture.html.name: CoFuture
Classes/CoFuture.html.abstract: Holder for a result that will be provided later.

Classes/CoPromise.html.name: CoPromise
Classes/CoPromise.html.abstract: A promise to provide a result later.
